name: Collie Defence
description:
You're a Border Collie and you need to protect your flock of sheep! New tower defence game for the Game Boy Advance!

🚧 Everything is work in progress  🚧  but here's the planned features for the final game:

  • 4 different beautiful biomes
  • 6 types of of enemies!
  • 4 kind of towers
  • Lot of levels!
  • Rumble pack support
  • Save support
  • Open Source

Made for the GBA Jam 2022


credit to my dog
